amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate with regard to aeronautics research and development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2543 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12784) To express the sense of the Senate with regard to aeronautics research and development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2543 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allen.
